text:
A 55-year-old woman, M. Manoranjitham, who fell from a two-wheeler, died at the Government Hospital here on Friday. Police said the incident happened when the woman was rushing to catch a town bus but fell from the two-wheeler. The police have registered a case and are investigating.

Fisherman goes missing

A 30-year-old fisherman E. Nelson of Pazhayaru was reported missing following the capsize of the boat near the estuary at Kollidam on Friday. Police said that two fishermen, Nelson and Kalaimani fell into the sea after the boat had capsized following rough weather while returning home after fishing. While the neighbouring fishermen rushed and rescued Kalaimani, Nelson could not be traced.
title: Woman dies of injuries
